long_description: since our inception, we have been serving both catholic and non-catholic students offering an alternate choice of education for anyone who wishes to attend. founded in 1959, st. pius x high school is a co-ed, four-year, comprehensive secondary school fully accredited by cognia which is the largest community of education professionals in the world. located in crystal city, missouri, st. we continue to grow in population and our up-to-date curriculum meets today's expanding standards in academics. pius x high school is a catholic community dedicated to the education of the whole person in an environment where extraordinary care and concern for the individual is ordinary.

generated_description: st. pius x high school, legally known as st. pius x national honor society, is a catholic high school located in crystal city, missouri. founded in 1959, it is a co-educational, four-year comprehensive secondary school accredited by cognia. the school serves both catholic and non-catholic students, offering an alternative choice of education. it is part of the st. pius x national honor society and is recognized as a cognia school of distinction. the school community comprises approximately 300 students and a dedicated staff of teachers and administrators.
